Braixen (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0653: Fennekin
Pokémon
#0655: Delphox →

Braixen has been featured on 7 different cards since it debuted in the Kalos Starter Set of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Braixen cards are normally Fire-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Braixen

Braixen
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Braixen Kalos Starter Set   9/39 XY Beginning Set   009/039
Braixen XY 25/146 Collection X 014/060
        M Master Deck Build Box Power Style   003/049
        Premium Champion Pack   018/131
Braixen BREAKthrough 26/162 Legendary Shine Collection 004/027
Braixen Fates Collide 12/124 Awakening Psychic King 010/078
XY Black Star Promos   XY161 XY-P Promotional cards   237/XY-P
Braixen Forbidden Light 16/131 Forbidden Light 013/094
        GX Ultra Shiny   020/150
Braixen Silver Tempest 026/195 Incandescent Arcana 017/068
Silver Tempest TG01/TG30 Incandescent Arcana 069/068
Charizard & Braixen
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Charizard & Braixen Cosmic Eclipse 22/236 Remix Bout 008/064
Cosmic Eclipse 212/236 Remix Bout 067/064
Cosmic Eclipse 251/236 Remix Bout 075/064
